creator: SlippyfopGames
descriptionHtml:
There's no wrong time for a drinking game!

A fun drinking game that’s playable from 2 to 12 players. No complicated rules just read what the device says and have fun!

Over 800 unique cards with THOUSANDS of combinations in multiple different game modes depending on what type of night you want.

- Spice it up with a heavy drinker mode that will end in a fun night...
- Make new friends in a very scandalous flirty mode...
- Play with your fellow nerds as you geek out in a nerd-filled mode...
- Spin a wheel to see who will be facing a punishment…
- Go for distance in endless mode…
- Or play the regular night-in mode...

Create up to 50 custom cards that will spice up the night with your own rules. Add special modifiers to let the card pick a random person, a random number or even a random letter of the alphabet.

Easily swap between any mode and even drop in and out of matches as needed.

Grab your friends and don't forget the drinks!
descriptionShort: Just read what the phone says and drink away!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 6.2:
- Updated a few rules to improve readability
- Improved code, the game should run better
- Added support for older devices
- Bug fixes

The total number of cards is now over 1000!

rated.label: PEGI 18
rated.learnMoreHtmlLink:
Use of alcohol/tobacco, Strong language
Learn more

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 7.0:
- House rules have a new look, including descriptions and titles for each rule.
- Many bug fixes and major changes to code. This should hopefully improve performance on older devices.
- Many card changes to improve readability
- New cards have been added to all modes.

To report a bug, please @Slippyfopgames on Twitter.

title: Drink To That - Drinking Game

creator: SlippyfopGames
descriptionHtml:
There's no wrong time for a drinking game!

A fun drinking game that’s playable from 2 to 12 players. No complicated rules just read what the device says and have fun!

Over 1500 unique cards with tons of combinations in multiple different game modes depending on what type of night you want.

- Spice it up with a heavy drinker mode that will end in a fun night...
- Make new friends in a very scandalous flirty mode...
- Play with your fellow nerds as you geek out in a nerd-filled mode...
- Spin a wheel to see who will be facing a punishment…
- Go for distance in endless mode…
- Or play the regular night-in mode...

Create custom cards that will spice up the night with your own rules. Add special modifiers to let the card pick a random person, a random number or even a random letter of the alphabet.
Share your Custom Rules with others or add them to a game mode so you will encounter them next time you play.

Easily swap between any mode and even drop in and out of matches as needed.

Grab your friends and don't forget the drinks!
descriptionShort: Just read what the phone says and drink away!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 10: The largest update yet!
- Custom Rules have been reworked!
- Upload your custom rules for all to see and download other people's custom rules.
- Custom Rules are now correctly included in the "amount of cards in play" number during games
- And much much more!

Report any bugs found over on Twitter @SlippyfopGames and find the full patch notes there.

Create custom cards that will spice up the night with your own rules. Add special modifiers to let the card pick a random person, a random number or even a random letter of the alphabet.
Share your Custom Rules with others or add them to a game mode so you will encounter them next time you play.

Easily swap between any mode and even drop in and out of matches as needed.

Grab your friends and don't forget the drinks!
descriptionShort: Just read what the phone says and drink away!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 10: The largest update yet!
- Custom Rules have been reworked!
- Upload your custom rules for all to see and download other people's custom rules.
- Custom Rules are now correctly included in the "amount of cards in play" number during games
- And much much more!

Report any bugs found over on Twitter @SlippyfopGames and find the full patch notes there.

rated.label: Mature 17+
rated.learnMoreHtmlLink:
Sexual Themes, Use of Alcohol, Strong Language
In-Game Purchases
Learn more

title: Drink To That - Drinking Game

creator: SlippyfopGames
descriptionHtml:
There's no wrong time for a drinking game!

A fun drinking game that’s playable from 2 to 12 players. No complicated rules just read what the device says and have fun!

Over 1500 unique cards with tons of combinations in multiple different game modes depending on what type of night you want.

- Spice it up with a heavy drinker mode that will end in a fun night...
- Make new friends in a very scandalous flirty mode...
- Play with your fellow nerds as you geek out in a nerd-filled mode...
- Spin a wheel to see who will be facing a punishment…
- Go for distance in endless mode…
- Or play the regular night-in mode...

Create custom cards that will spice up the night with your own rules. Add special modifiers to let the card pick a random person, a random number or even a random letter of the alphabet.
Share your Custom Rules with others or add them to a game mode so you will encounter them next time you play.

Easily swap between any mode and even drop in and out of matches as needed.

Grab your friends and don't forget the drinks!
descriptionShort: Just read what the phone says and drink away!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 10.1:
- Icon pack 5 has been added to the shop.
- Fixed bugs that incorrectly displayed what items players had bought from the shop.
- Fixed a bug with Icon Pack 4 that made it seem as though the pack wasn't unlocked.
- Changed the wording of some cards
- New cards have been added.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
V11.0
The final major update for Drink To That

Custom Modes:
4 new modes have been added all containing pre-existing cards but all based around a theme. For example, a deck of only Rule cards.

New Icons:
New subscriber icons have been added.

Minor Tweaks:
Other minor changes

New cards have been added to all modes.
